description.value:
You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes. You become @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} to all creatures, and you are @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from undead creatures regardless of what precise senses they have; this grants the effects of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Invisibility]{Invisibility}, but against all the undead creature's precise senses. If you physically @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Interact]{Interact} with an undead creature or use a hostile action, the spell ends.

Heightened (+1) You can target one additional willing creature within 30 feet. The spell ends if any target physically Interacts with an undead creature or uses a hostile action.
